title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 157.6 - Screening location, materials and methods
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 157.6 - Screening location, materials and methods

State Regulations

Any person undertaking to screen a junkyard or scrap metal
processing facility which is in violation of section
157.3
of this Part must obtain the
approval of the Commissioner of Transportation as to the location, materials
and construction methods to be utilized. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
157.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
